channel.title: Project Null 317 [OFFICIAL THREAD]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://project-null.com/img/BANNER1.png[/img] [b]The Official Project Null 317[/b][/center] [b]Permission to Post (granted by Newty on IRC)[/b]
[13:03:33] <[ O]AMERIKA> can i have permission to repost the new official project null 317 thread... [13:03:46] <[ O]AMERIKA> to display more as a show off thread [13:03:51] Yep, don't advertise or break any rules, etc/ [13:03:57] <[ O]AMERIKA> k thx babe [13:04:12] np honey
[b]The Project:[/b] This project will be done with the PhoneScape version of winterLove's server base. Before you rant about how wL is a shitty base and whatnot, please, read further on. I have gutted the server of almost everything. All skills (including Combat) was removed, and then later re-written. We are going to add new features and make every weapon and combat-related skill work. These skills include Fletching, Magic, Ranging, Runecrafting, et cetera. [b][i]The Goal:[/i][/b] The goal of this Project is to turn a server that is completely horrible, and turn it around to a new, stable, and enjoyable server. The final product will work [size=20pt][b]100%[/b][/size] with the MoparScape v3.2 client. That means there will be no "custom" or "silab" items. Just classic items, from the good old days :) [b][i]Edit Log:[/i][/b] [code] Added Custom Admin System * IP Bans & Mutes * Account Bans & Mutes * Custom PlayerRights (Management, Admin, Exception) * Global Mutes apply to all users excluding staff [/code] [b][i]Currently working on:[/i][/b] [code] * Anti DDoS * Auto mute system * Fixing timers for animations * Fixing leveling system * Customizing some teleport spells to fit our needs :) [/code] [b][i]Pictures:[/i][/b] [u]NOTE[/u]: These aren't the best pictures, but they are some that give you an idea of what is going on. [img]http://project-null.com/img/Update%201/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://project-null.com/img/Update%201/3.jpg[/img] Please post your support. Positions to help BETA test are open, just message me on IRC (channel is #PNull). [b]MORE WORK TO BE ADDED SOON.[/b]

item.title: Project Null 317 [OFFICIAL THREAD]
item.dc:creator: @davidscherman davidscherman
item.description:
@davidscherman wrote:

Omg BRILLIANT IDEA, i love the good old days back before silab, back with fr33sc4p3 pkz, i tried hosting it b4 it is so unstable, phonescape and barrowscape was also my favs, then silab came and project czar was the new fr33sc4p3… I love your idea… <3 – SUPPORT

Read full topic

item.title: Project Null 317 [OFFICIAL THREAD]
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

NEW UPDATES (wont let me add to main post :<)

UPDATE 6-6
* Working account and IP banning from IRC (and unbanning)
* Instant muting from IRC (and unmuting)
* Global mute server from IRC (excludes all staff)
* Add/remove Admins and mods from IRC
* Normal users are able to send messages into the game (except under global mute)
* You can get the player count from IRC
* constantly working on more...

[hr]
A list of current commands on IRC (constantly updating and adding)

Sending a message on IRC ingame

Getting the player count on IRC (is bugged :[)

Banning from IRC (works 100% :]). Same for unban, just unbans user.

Just click the IRC Tab on the navigation bar above, and then when you connect to the server, type /join #Pnull to come and join our testing!

Read full topic

item.title: Project Null 317 [OFFICIAL THREAD]
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote=“Graham, post:9, topic:282170”][quote author=CAPT_AMERIKA link=topic=372832.msg2813406#msg2813406 date=1244137375]
this is not deltascape newty. this is PhoneScape, which is a edit of wL you twat
[/quote]

Even DeltaScape is based on Winterlove :P. Practically every server here is with the exception of a few (rs2d and some of the newer ones like RuneSource).[/quote]
Well it is the Main client for this project. When you first start playing RS Private servers, one of the first clients you download is the MoparScape client. Plus, a goal of this project is to make a server 100% compatible with MoparScape v3.2. Who wants to download another client?

jc22493:

You actually used somewhat proper grammar in your post, Amerika; good job.

thanks. means alot coming from an azn

<3

Read full topic

I hope it’s not going to be the main client used?
The MoparScape 3.2 client uses the 369 cache, not 377.
It takes about 5 minutes to download a 317 deob and the load the 377 cache, and it’s moar items?[/quote]

Hes got a great point… I dont personally like the mopar client, never have.

item.title: Project Null 317 [OFFICIAL THREAD]
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[center]
The Official Project Null 317[/center]

Permission to Post (granted by Newty on IRC)

[13:03:33] <[ O]AMERIKA> can i have permission to repost the new official project null 317 thread... [13:03:46] <[ O]AMERIKA> to display more as a show off thread [13:03:51] Yep, don't advertise or break any rules, etc/ [13:03:57] <[ O]AMERIKA> k thx babe [13:04:12] np honey

The Project:
This project will be done with the PhoneScape version of winterLove’s server base. Before you rant about how wL is a shitty base and whatnot, please, read further on. I have gutted the server of almost everything. All skills (including Combat) was removed, and then later re-written. We are going to add new features and make every weapon and combat-related skill work. These skills include Fletching, Magic, Ranging, Runecrafting, et cetera.

The Goal:
The goal of this Project is to turn a server that is completely horrible, and turn it around to a new, stable, and enjoyable server. The final product will work [size=20pt]100%[/size] with the MoparScape v3.2 client. That means there will be no “custom” or “silab” items. Just classic items, from the good old days
Edit Log:

Added Custom Admin System
* IP Bans & Mutes
* Account Bans & Mutes
* Custom PlayerRights (Management, Admin, Exception)
* Global Mutes apply to all users excluding staff

Currently working on:

* Anti DDoS
* Auto mute system
* Fixing timers for animations
* Fixing leveling system
* Customizing some teleport spells to fit our needs :)

Pictures:
NOTE: These aren’t the best pictures, but they are some that give you an idea of what is going on.


Please post your support. Positions to help BETA test are open, just message me on IRC (channel is #PNull).

MORE WORK TO BE ADDED SOON.

Read full topic
